title: 595. Reaction to Bill O'Brien's Firing
itunes:title: 595. Reaction to Bill O'Brien's Firing
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode. To start off, the guys break down the Patriots vs. Chiefs game and the Falcons vs. Packers MNF matchup (:12). Then, the pair react to the Texans firing head coach and GM Bill O'Brien, while also discussing why this vacant position is a good job and giving names of potential candidates to fill it (8:18). After that, the duo point out the Cowboys and their lack of effort on defense, and they also respond to quotes from Cowboys head coach Mike McCarthy and owner Jerry Jones (28:32). To wrap up the show, the guys analyze North Dakota State QB Trey Lance's one-game showcase from this past weekend (42:28).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
